channel.title: Shops and Npc spawning
channel.description: How do I make a shop and make a train area? Also how do I change the starter gear and spawn area? Srry about me being such a noob.

item.title: Shops and Npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The starter gear (if its wearing) is in player.java
the starter in inventory would be in client.java

For starter in inventory try searching starter == 0

Read full topic

item.title: Shops and Npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

for train area choose a spot you would like.
get the coords by typing ::coords or ::mypos
open npcspawn.cfg type the id’s of the npc you want there and the tiles.
edit the drops.

for shops.
spawn the npc in npcspawn.cfg
make a shop with items in shops.cfg
and open client.java and make a wanneshop for it.

DONE!

not spoon feeding with details…
like “PushedPrawn” said.

Read full topic
